website_summaries.verdict: Customers seeking a standard, medium-size broom will be impressed with this affordable option.
pros: Handle is 53 inches, which is great for taller buyers
Dustpan snaps onto top of broom handle for easy storage
Heavy-duty bristles work well for outdoor cleaning

customer_reviews.title: Perfect broom
customer_reviews.text: The only broom on the market worth buying. I have tried all other brooms and none of them are like this one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Purchase Any Other Brand
customer_reviews.text: Discovered the Libman broom at my ex-girlfriend's. Tough enough to brush away light snow and leaves from the front patio / sidewalk, but gentle enough to sweep the kitchen tile without shooting everything across the floor. We have two of them, now; one for inside the house, and the other for the garage. Excellent
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Bristles not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: After a few weeks, the Libman Precision Angle Broom started to come apart. The bristles are out of place which makes it difficult to sweep. The dust pan is okay.
customer_reviews.author: dadofraa

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: It is stiffer than the Libman broom I used to own. It’s heavier too. It’s bound to be sturdy. No assembly required.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Green

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this new Libman broom to replace one I've owned ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this new Libman broom to replace one I've owned for years (it looks the same in the photo). However, this one is several inches more narrow, hasn't got as many bristles, and will take me longer than the larger Libman version I already own. Wish I had realized the size was so much smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Home Cook

customer_reviews.title: Decent broom but you have to be careful with it or the bristles fray
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy handle but broom itself does not hold up very well. If it gets damp or extremely dusty it is hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Super shopper

customer_reviews.title: My favorite broom!
customer_reviews.text: Just the right length and size. Love it! I own two!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: I am glad that I purchased this broom
customer_reviews.text: I am glad that I purchased this broom. It sweeps very well. I use it every day and it is still in great condition!
customer_reviews.author: KSS

customer_reviews.title: Love this broom!
customer_reviews.text: These brooms are great! I have two at my house and bought another for work. This one is a little smaller than the two at my house but it was perfect for what I needed here. Very sturdy I like the design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job on the dog fur. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: SadPuppy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy ass broom! Our second Libman and made in America!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Swept off my feet!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get excited about a broom, but I did anyway. This is the best one I've ever had. It is my kitchen broom. As others have stated it is very stiff and durable. Surprisingly so. I use it several times every day and it show no signs of wear. The angle is great for sweeping corners, under radiators, and stairs. I like that it has a dustpan that snaps right onto the handle so I don't loose it! and the tip is fine enough to collect even sand. It's not too heavy, a perfect size Great buy, great value.
customer_reviews.author: Speech teacher

customer_reviews.title: The item came damaged and bent already
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy a broom like this. Get one that you can assemble or have a better delivery service than UPS
customer_reviews.author: russellzeng

customer_reviews.title: Happily Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching forever for a broom that would sweep up the tiny particles (dust and hair) that accumulate in my house. I also wanted a dustpan that wouldn't leave a line of debris behind. It looks like I found them. I've only had them for two days, but I already love both. We'll see how they stand up to the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, I thought this would be the right broom ...
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, I thought this would be the right broom to replace my former Libman broom that rusted through causing the brush end to fall off. My former broom was heavy duty and I moved snow with it but this broom is a lightweight cheaper version that can be purchased (I checked today) at the grocer for 12.99 and less when on sale. If you require a lightweight broom for sweeping the floor this is it but consider its expense.
customer_reviews.author: C Crost

customer_reviews.title: This broom is da bomb!!!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect pair of cleaning products to have in your utility closet. Gets into those tight little corners, the small space between the wall & the fridge, etc. It's nice to have the dustpan attach to the pole of the broom so it's not constantly getting misplaced. GREAT purchase at an even better price. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lovell_Lady

customer_reviews.title: Half the work.
customer_reviews.text: Packing, delivery and quality were great. My caregiver loves this set. Much better than my old ones. Half the work when you only have to sweep once. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Heavy for its size
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than I thought. It has nice bristles but does but is weighty which makes it clumsy to sweep in corners. WIll use on my deck.
customer_reviews.author: gman

customer_reviews.title: Light broom
customer_reviews.text: Nice light weight broom, easy to use Andy like dust pan being able to attach to broom.
customer_reviews.author: Jan c

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than my previous Libmann broom, so disappointed about that
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great Broom & dustpan
customer_reviews.text: Great angled broom! Bristles stay put and it does a great job sweeping my floors.The dustpan hooks on to the broom handle which is nice. It is a nice dustpan too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice broom
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than my other one from a store, and a bit firmer. I like
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Best broom ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST broom! Great quality, sturdy and the perfect height. The only broom I use.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: one of the best brooms i’ve owned
customer_reviews.text: seriously, it’s a broom. but, boy, it’s a great one
customer_reviews.author: dexelzey

customer_reviews.title: yup, it's just a broom, but it's the little things, people!
customer_reviews.text: nice broom. does what a broom should do very well - would purchase again and again and, yeah, again. that's it!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Sichel

customer_reviews.title: Love this for a quick clean up
customer_reviews.text: Love this for a quick clean up. Especially when the grandbaby visits and there are Cheerios everywhere! Good quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Bern44

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted for a gift. Sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: which I liked.
customer_reviews.text: Small. Should have checked the size. Previously had the same one but larger, which I liked.
customer_reviews.author: Manhattan NY

customer_reviews.title: Quality decline.
customer_reviews.text: As someone who has bought Libman brooms/products for years, and can compare them side by side to the older ones, i am very disappointed. Same price point, yet they made it slightly smaller, and the bristles are not as sturdy. Libman has done to the broom industry what the airlines have done to economy seating. Wish i could return, but it's already been used a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Frayed bristles
customer_reviews.text: Plastic bristles.. the bristles are not sturdy. They are frayed. It sweeps ok. It gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: The broom works fine, though it's light
customer_reviews.text: The broom works fine, though it's light, but the dustpan sucks. I have to position is just so in order for the crumbs, etc. to get onto the dustpan, and I usually have to sweep the stuff onto it 4 or 5 times before it's mostly all on there. It's also white and it's hard to get all the dust and such off the dustpan without sweeping that, too.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Almozara

customer_reviews.title: Junk quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is total junk! The broomhead broke off very easily. Do NOT believe the good ratings. I will never buy another Libman product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to store - too heavy
customer_reviews.text: I hate this broom. I've never hated a broom before. :D It sweeps well yes, but try putting it away once your done. It does not lean against anything without boomeranging back and falling over. That drives me insane. That dang broom slamming to ground has startled our whole house more times than I can count. The other thing thing i hate is how heavy it is. Is there lead in the bristles!? Just the worse broom I've ever had.:(
customer_reviews.author: Bunnee

customer_reviews.title: Broom works fine, it's an effective broom
customer_reviews.text: Dirt and dust stick to the inside of the dust pan. Static electricity I guess. Drives me insane. Broom works fine, it's an effective broom.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Menosky

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Average broom. Nothing fancy. Moderate dust collecting ability. Some particles missed but seems most brooms these days are subpar as everyone is hoping you'll purchase a ridiculous swiffer, which probably works well but costs a fortune in cleaning pads. None of these seem to last very long as they seem made with built in obsolescence.
customer_reviews.author: KC Cowgirl

product_meta.title: Libman Precision Angle Broom with Dustpan
product_meta.description: The Large Precision Angle Broom and dustpan set. The broom fibers are precisely cut to reach under cabinets and tight corners. The flagged fibers pick up dirt, dust and debris. Dustpan has teeth on the side to remove debris from broom. Longer life, fiber made from recycled PET bottles. Excellent for indoor or outdoor use. Guaranteed quality construction. Hanger tip for convenient storage. 6" long fibers.
feature_bullets: 10" wide maid broom with 53" total height
3/4" Steel handle with hanger hole, and solid one piece resin block
Longer life, environmentally-friendly recycled PET fiber

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars147 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
